one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 20 or lower)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 30 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Kill 30 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 21-40)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 30 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Kill 30 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 41-50)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 40 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 40 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 51-60)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 50 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 50 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 61-70)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 60 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 60 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 71-75)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 80 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 80 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Daily Hunting (Lv. 76 or higher)
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 100 monsters to complete the mission. You can play this mission every day. You should hunt monsters of level (Character level - 10) or above.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 100 monsters.

one_day_reward.name: Go Fishing
one_day_reward.description: Fish 100 times to complete the mission. \nYou can play this mission only once a week.
one_day_reward.target: Obtainable by fishing 100 times

one_day_reward.name: Log-in on Weekends
one_day_reward.description: Log in Saturday or Sunday to complete the mission. \nYou can play this mission only once a week.
one_day_reward.target: Obtainable by logging in on weekends

one_day_reward.name: Join a Clan
one_day_reward.description: Join a clan to complete the mission. \nYou can play this mission only once.
one_day_reward.target: Obtainable by joining a clan

one_day_reward.name: Alligator Island Exploration (Level 35-50)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 100 Nos are hunted on Alligator Island. Can be done daily.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 100 Nos are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Forest of Mirrors Exploration (Level 45-60)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 30 Earth's Guardian Harit are hunted in the Forest of Mirrors. Can be done daily.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 30 Harit are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Seal of Shilen Exploration (Level 55-70)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 30 Guardian Palibati are hunted in the Seal of Shilen. Can be done daily.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 30 Palibati are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Forsaken Plains Exploration (Level 65-75)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 30 Forsaken Brave Sharp Talon Tigers are hunted on the Forsaken Plains. Can be done daily.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 30 Sharp Talon Tigers are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Hot Springs Exploration (Level 76 +)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 100 Hot Springs Yeti, Hot Springs Buffalo, Hot Springs Grendel are hunted. Can be done daily.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 100 Hot Springs Yeti, Hot Springs Buffalo, Hot Springs Grendel are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Attribute Monster Hunt
one_day_reward.description: Hunt Monsters with Attributes. Mission can only be completed 1 time in 1 week.
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 1,800 Attribute Monsters are hunted

one_day_reward.name: Giant's Cave Exploration
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 200 Monsters are hunted on the Upper and Lower Level excluding entrance to Giant's Cave. Can be done daily. \n(Level 76 or higher may engage in hunt)
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 200 Giant's Cave Monsters are hunted.

one_day_reward.name: Forgotten Island Exploration
one_day_reward.description: Completed when 200 Monsters are hunted in the inner area of Forgotten Island past entrance. Can be done daily. \n(Level 78 or higher may engage in hunt)
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when 200 Forgotten Island Monsters are hunted.

one_day_reward.name: Adventurer's Journey I (Lv. 20-30)
one_day_reward.description: Completed when killing 100 monsters in Ruins of Agony/Abandoned Camp.
one_day_reward.target: Obtain after killing 100 monters in the recommended hunting ground

one_day_reward.name: Attack Clan Raid
one_day_reward.description: Hunt 1 raid monster in the Clan Arena. You can play the mission only once a week. (Must be part of a clan to complete.)
one_day_reward.target: Hunt 1 raid monster in the Clan Arena to receive the reward.

one_day_reward.name: Defeat Spirits King Ignis
one_day_reward.description: Completed when Spirits King Ignis is defeated 10 times at Spirit King's Abode. Can only be completed 1 time. (Level 76 or higher may engage in battle)
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when Spirits King Ignis is defeated 10 times

one_day_reward.name: Defeat Spirits Queen Nebula
one_day_reward.description: Completed when Spirits Queen Nebula is defeated 10 times at Spirit Queen's Abode. Can only be completed 1 time. (Level 76 or higher may engage in battle)
one_day_reward.target: Can be received when Spirits Queen Nebula is defeated 10 times
